text: Maja Lidia Kossakowska-Grzędowicz (27 February 1972 – 23 May 2022) was a Polish fantasy writer, archeologist and journalist. She was first published in 1997. She was nominated eight times for the Janusz A. Zajdel Award for her short stories and novels. Many of her books had themes of angels. Kossakowska was born in Warsaw, Poland. Kossakowska was killed in a house fire on 23 May 2022 in Stare Załubice, Poland at the age of 50. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Archaeologists Category:Polish novelists Category:Writers from Warsaw Category:Deaths from fire
title: Maja Lidia Kossakowska
